content: slouchy beanie pattern sized from baby to adult with a little cable detail pattern includes charts and written pattern ohje myös suomeksi danish translation available here 1 materials yarn lamana cusco 100% alpaca 2 skeins 50g/93yds/85m per skein or any other dk-weight yarn to achieve the correct gauge needles us 8 5 mm 16 /40 cm circular needle us 6 4 mm 16 /40 cm circular needle adjust the needle size to get the correct gauge other cable needle tapestry needle stitch marker 1 http //strikkeglad dk/4296/latu-hue/
